DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the development of human laboratory study model of cocaine relapse prevention.
DOC.brief_title: Development of Human Laboratory Study Model of Cocaine Relapse Prevention. - 1
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective of this study will be to develop experimental procedures and parameters demonstrating arousal and craving responses to cocaine-related environmental cues as a model for future testing of the relapse prevention medication treatment of cocaine addiction.
DOC.criteria: Cocaine dependent, non treatment seeking individuals Please contact site directly for details.
